pages.text: The Rift Crystal has two modes: "Obliterate Block" and "Obliterate Entity", which both do as their names suggest. They launch a projectile where you are looking, similar to a snowball. The Rift Crystal requires a $(l:reagents/rift_reagent)Rift Reagent$(/l), and causes permanent insanity if you use it with a $(l:reagents/rift_reagent)Rift Reagent$(/l).
